reqs:
Pre-reqs: MUSC 220 and one of MUSC 100, MUSC 110.
Must read music. It is recommended that students who take this course have completed MUSC 101 and MUSC 220, or if not, get approval from the instructor. Select MUSC 221 Lecture + one tutorial. Note: 50 of the 65 released seats are reserved for BMUS students only. Class open to non-music students. If class is full, register for WAITLIST, as available.
MUSC 221 Tutorial
MUSC 221 Tutorial
MUSC 221 Tutorial
description: The development of Western music from circa 1900; an introduction to jazz and popular music and to music of selected non-Western societies.
